entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -27.4°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -31.0°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
